channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-pie (0.7.3)
item.description: A flake8 extension that implements misc. lints
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-timeout (0.2)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks that a timeout is set to all requests calls
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-rst-docstrings (0.2.1)
item.description: Python docstring reStructuredText (RST) validator
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-tabs (2.3.2)
item.description: Tab (or Spaces) indentation style checker for flake
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-aaa (0.11.2)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin that checks Python tests follow the Arrange-Act-Assert pattern
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-functions (0.0.6)
item.description: A flake8 extension that checks functions
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-tuple-trailing-commas (0.1.3)
item.description: flake8 plugin for enforcing few rules
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-idom-hooks (0.4.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to enforce the rules of hooks for IDOM

item.title: Updated: hacking (4.1)
item.description: OpenStack Hacking Guideline Enforcement

item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding use of functions that can be replaced by pathlib module.

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (21.4.3)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)
